Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People on social media are abuzz with the upcoming federal budget in Australia. Many are calling for increased funding for a variety of causes including raising the jobseeker rate providing support for youth and women covering the spiralling costs of aged care services and welfare and finding full funding for local projects. The calls to action are coming from various sources including GPs economists and organizations such as Homelessness Australia. The government's ability to address the criticisms and concerns will be revealed in the upcoming federal budget.
